entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow changing to snow mixed with ice pellets this evening and ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
